resources.string: Study and Entertainment simultaneously. Play quiz and study. View full questions as you need.
Compete yourself with other fellow students to stay on top.
Find the details all the BSc.CSIT affiliated colleges.
Get every official and unofficial notices and news about entrance from T.U or other related authorities
Discuss your queries with our seniors and experts
View your result instantly in a more convenient way.

The book for the entrance preparation is out now in the market, this book contains the all the old questions and model question which are designed according to the TU entrance syllabus.

The main features of the book are listed below 
1. Math Formulas 
2. Grammar Formulas 
3. Physics Important Key 
4. Chemistry Important Reactions 
and many more..... 

If you want to get the book, Please contact Gopal Nepal (9849665162), the marketing manager of the book or go to the Thamel Books locates right infront of the Amrit Campus.
